property.name: youapp.mvc.pageable.service.factory
property.description: youappmvc pageable service factory provided by jquery data table

property.name: databind.property.ext.handler.classes
property.description: any handler must implements {j.jave.kernal.jave.support.databind.proext.JPropertyExtendHandler} split by comma

property.name: youapp.mvc.html.root.in.zookeeper
property.description: all moduls page may regster in the path in the zookeeper.
